examples: Parents often support their children financially during college.
His parents footed the bill for his college education.
My parents always took an interest in my hobbies.
My parents enjoyed a delicious calamari appetizer at the seaside restaurant.
My parents always drink orange juice for breakfast.
words.defineEn: our mother or our father
words.defineVi: mẹ của chúng tôi hoặc cha của chúng tôi

examples: Fathers play a crucial role in their children's upbringing and development.
My father pays his bills at the beginning of the month.
My father has brown eyes.
Her father kept a grocer's shop.
My father always had a lead foot.
words.defineEn: a child's male parent
words.defineVi: cha mẹ nam của một đứa trẻ

examples: The mother gently cradled her newborn baby in her arms.
My mother pickled radishes with vinegar and spices.
My mother throws that far away.
This picture shows my mother as a young woman.
My mother has blue eyes and black hair.
words.defineEn: a child's female parent
words.defineVi: cha mẹ của một đứa trẻ

examples: My dad bought a stylish suit for his friend's wedding.
My dad grilled a succulent pork joint with barbecue sauce for a backyard cookout.
My dad spread a thick layer of orange marmalade on my morning toast.
My dad works forty hours a week.
My dad doesn't play golf any more.
words.defineEn: an informal way of calling our father
words.defineVi: một cách không chính thức để gọi cha của chúng tôi

examples: My mom wears facial mask sometmes.
My mom planted beautiful flowers in the front yard.
My mom made a delicious homemade Marmite spread.
My mom peeled a ripe banana for me.
My mom is an amazing cook.
words.defineEn: a female parent who has given birth to a child or someone who has taken on the responsibility of caring for and raising a child
words.defineVi: cha mẹ là phụ nữ đã sinh con hoặc người đã nhận trách nhiệm chăm sóc, nuôi dạy con

examples: My wife talked sense into me.
His wife drove him to Regent's Park.
He leaves a wife and two children.
As a loving husband, he surprises his wife with romantic gestures on special occasions.
My wife enjoys reading books in her free time during the week.
words.defineEn: the lady you are officially married to
words.defineVi: người phụ nữ bạn đã chính thức kết hôn

examples: Her husband had been very involved in his work.
She lost her husband in the fire.
She lost her husband in the crowd.
Her husband disappeared into thin air for years.
She introduced her husband as a successful entrepreneur during the charity event.
words.defineEn: the man you are officially married to
words.defineVi: người đàn ông bạn đã chính thức kết hôn

examples: The children enjoyed a refreshing slice of watermelon on a hot summer day.
Parents often support their children financially during college.
The children threw the crumpled paper balls into the classroom trash can.
The children decorated their cupcakes on a colorful dish.
The children drank their juice from colorful plastic glasses.
words.defineEn: a son or daughter of any age
words.defineVi: con trai hay con gái ở mọi lứa tuổi

examples: My son reads twelve pages of his book every day.
My sister's son is my beloved nephew.
His son doesn't share his passion for athletics.
Your son is in high school already?
My son is coming home soon.
words.defineEn: a person's male child
words.defineVi: con trai của một người

examples: The father proudly walked his daughter down the aisle on her wedding day.
My daughter always has her head in the clouds as she walks home from school.
My daughters love gur candies that their grandfather buys for them.
My daughter enjoys homemade popsicles I make with pomegranate juice.
Their daughter is as clever as they come.
words.defineEn: a person's female child
words.defineVi: con gái của một người

examples: My sister has a job at a restaurant as a waitress.
My sister skillfully cooks a flavorful curry for dinner.
My sister has a girl crush on Billie Eilish.
My sister packed some Spanish limes in her picnic basket for a tangy snack on our outdoor adventure.
He loved his sister dearly.
words.defineEn: a lady who shares a mother and father with us
words.defineVi: một người phụ nữ chia sẻ một người mẹ và cha với chúng tôi

examples: Her brother is the bane of her life.
The three brothers took stock of the warehouse.
My brother always drinks smoothie after exercising.
My brother taught me the best way to cook spuds over the campfire.
She has one brother and two sisters.
words.defineEn: a man who shares a mother and father with us
words.defineVi: một người đàn ông chia sẻ một người mẹ và cha với chúng tôi

examples: Most families have one or two skeletons in the closet.
His family comes first.
His family is as poor as a Job's turkey.
Her family is English to the core.
My family goes on a vacation once a year.
words.defineEn: people that are related to each other by blood or marriage, normally made up of a father, mother, and their children
words.defineVi: những người có quan hệ huyết thống với nhau hoặc hôn nhân, thường bao gồm cha, mẹ và con cái của họ

examples: My grandmother kept chickens in her back yard.
My grandmother made a dress for me.
My grandmother baked a batch of foxtail millet and chocolate chip cookies for us.
My grandmother makes the most amazing damson jam every summer.
The antique clock belongs to my grandmother.
words.defineEn: the woman who is our mom or dad's mother
words.defineVi: người phụ nữ là mẹ của chúng tôi hoặc mẹ của cha

examples: My grandfather was a man of few words.
My grandfather was a bit of a rough diamond.
My grandfather used to raise chickens on his farm.
My grandfather immigrated to America from a small European town.
My grandfather enjoys growing his own salad greens in his backyard garden.
words.defineEn: the man who is our mom or dad's father
words.defineVi: người đàn ông là cha hoặc mẹ của chúng tôi

examples: The old woman knitted blankets for her grandchildren.
The lion’s share of his money went to his grandchildren.
Her grandchild loves to play with dolls.
He takes his grandchild to the zoo and teaches them about different animals.
The grandparents cherished the memories of their grandchildren, who were the apples of their eyes.
words.defineEn: your daughter or son's child
words.defineVi: con gái hay con trai của bạn

examples: Anne's aunt always sends her birthday cards and gifts.
My aunt is a really kind sister to my father.
Her aunt is very sweet but not all there.
My aunt and I are related by blood.
We have a big family with many uncles and aunts.
words.defineEn: the sister of our mother or father or their sibling's wife
words.defineVi: em gái của mẹ hoặc cha của chúng tôi hoặc vợ của anh chị em ruột của họ

examples: The proud uncle held his newborn nephew in his arms.
His uncle is like a second father to him.
My uncle buys and sells antiques for a living.
We have a big family with many uncles and aunts.
You should ask your uncle to share stories about your family's history and traditions.
words.defineEn: the brother of our father or mother or their sibling's husband
words.defineVi: anh trai của cha hoặc mẹ của chúng tôi hoặc chồng của anh chị em ruột của họ

examples: Her niece is the youngest member of the family and everyone loves her.
Her niece is the only granddaughter in the family and is treated like a princess.
My niece is like a little sister to me, and I try to be a positive influence in her life.
She and her niece enjoy gardening and planting flowers in the backyard.
He loves spending time with his niece, teaching her how to play guitar.
words.defineEn: our sister or brother's daughter, or the daughter of our husband or wife's siblings
words.defineVi: con gái của chị gái hoặc anh trai của chúng tôi, hoặc con gái của anh chị em ruột của chồng hoặc vợ của chúng tôi

examples: The proud uncle held his newborn nephew in his arms.
My sister's son is my beloved nephew.
My nephew is coming to visit us this weekend.
I bought a toy for my nephew's birthday.
She loves spending time with her adorable nephews.
words.defineEn: our sister or brother's son, or the son of our husband or wife's siblings
words.defineVi: con trai của chị gái hoặc anh trai của chúng tôi, hoặc con trai của anh chị em ruột của chồng hoặc vợ của chúng tôi

examples: Her cousins are like siblings to her.
My cousin objected and he was not a minority of one.
Tom's cousin inherited a large sum of money from his parents, but he didn't have good money management skills.
I have a big family with lots of cousins and aunts and uncles.
Her cousin is like a brother to her, and they share many interests and hobbies.
words.defineEn: our aunt or uncle's child
words.defineVi: con của dì hoặc chú của chúng tôi
